  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_109876</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_109876</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Plasmolysis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Plasmolyse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plasmolyse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Plasmolysis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Plasmolisi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Plasmolysis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Plasmolysis</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates plasmolysis in a plant cell. When the water potential of a solution is low, the protoplast shrinks and pulls away from the cell wall.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cell wall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plant cell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plasma membrane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plasmolysis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">protoplast</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt Plasmolyse in einer 
Betriebszelle. Wenn das Wasserpotential einer Lösung niedrig 
ist, schrumpft der Protoplast und zieht weg von der Zellwand.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre la plasmolyse dans 
une cellule d'usine. Quand le potentiel de l'eau d'une solution 
est bas, le protoplaste se rétrécit et tire loin du mur de cellules.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra o plasmolysis em uma 
pilha da planta. Quando o potencial da água de uma solução é
baixo, o protoplast encolhe e puxa afastado da parede de pilha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra la plasmolisi in 
una cellula della pianta. Quando il potenziale dell'acqua di una
soluzione è basso, il protoplasto ristringe e tira via dalla parete 
delle cellule.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει plasmolysis σε ένα 
κύτταρο φυτών. Όταν η δυνατότητα ύδατος μιας λύσης είναι 
χαμηλή, protoplast στενεύει και τραβά μακρυά από τον τοίχο 
κυττάρων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra plasmolysis en una 
célula de la planta. Cuando el potencial del agua de una 
solución es bajo, el protoplasto se contrae y tira lejos de la pared 
de célula.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zellwand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betriebszelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Plasmamembrane</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
